questions.question: Which of the following is the most common type of cement used in construction?
questions.explanation: Ordinary Portland Cement (OPC) is the most widely used type of cement, suitable for all general concrete construction.

questions.question: The process of levelling in surveying is used to determine:
questions.explanation: Levelling is a branch of surveying, the object of which is to establish points at a given elevation or to determine the relative elevations of different points.
